attributes.action: Use armed forces to return all incoming boats to last safe place of origin.
attributes.additional_details: We have made our own street dangerous by allowing masses of unknown people entry to our beloved country. We must stop giving in to everything in the name of multiculturalism.
attributes.background: Stop people illegally landing on our shores and gaining entry without a passport. Absolute minimum benefits for incoming migrants until been in full employment for 5 years. Use army style  tents and canteens with basic facilities until they can support themselves.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to have a clear request. We are not sure exactly what you mean by absolute minimum benefits.

You may wish to sign this petition:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/730769
